background: A toy store aims to maximize gift deliveries using seasonal and full-time volunteers within the points budget they have for rewarding the volunteers. They must also adhere to a certain composition of volunteer types.

parameters.definition: Points for service per seasonal volunteer
Points for service per full-time volunteer
Gifts delivered by a seasonal volunteer
Gifts delivered by a full-time volunteer
Maximum percentage of volunteers that can be seasonal

constraints.description: Total points awarded to seasonal volunteers cannot exceed MaxPoints
constraints.code:
# Add constraint: Total points awarded to seasonal volunteers cannot exceed MaxPoints
model.addConstr(SeasonalVolunteers * SeasonalPoints <= MaxPoints, name="max_seasonal_points")

constraints.description: Total points awarded to full-time volunteers cannot exceed MaxPoints
constraints.code:
FullTimePoints = data["FullTimePoints"]  # scalar parameter
MaxPoints = data["MaxPoints"]  # scalar parameter
FullTimeVolunteers = model.addVar(vtype=gp.GRB.INTEGER, name="FullTimeVolunteers")

# Constraint: Total points awarded to full-time volunteers cannot exceed MaxPoints
model.addConstr(FullTimePoints * FullTimeVolunteers <= MaxPoints, name="FullTimeVolunteerPointsLimit")

constraints.description: The percentage of seasonal volunteers cannot exceed MaxSeasonalPercent
constraints.code:
# Add constraint to ensure the percentage of seasonal volunteers does not exceed MaxSeasonalPercent
model.addConstr((SeasonalVolunteers / (SeasonalVolunteers + FullTimeVolunteers)) <= MaxSeasonalPercent, "max_seasonal_volunteers_percent_constraint")

constraints.description: The number of full-time volunteers must be at least the minimum required number of full-time volunteers
constraints.code:
# Constraint for minimum number of full-time volunteers
model.addConstr(FullTimeVolunteers >= MinFullTimeVolunteers, name="min_full_time_volunteers")

constraints.description: Total points allocated to volunteers should not exceed the maximum available points
constraints.code:
# Total points allocated to volunteers should not exceed the maximum available points
model.addConstr(SeasonalPoints * SeasonalVolunteers + FullTimePoints * FullTimeVolunteers <= MaxPoints, name="max_points_allocation")

constraints.description: The number of seasonal volunteers must not exceed the predetermined percentage of the total number of volunteers.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for the number of seasonal volunteers not to exceed the predetermined percentage of the total number of volunteers
model.addConstr(SeasonalVolunteers <= MaxSeasonalPercent * (SeasonalVolunteers + FullTimeVolunteers), name="max_seasonal_volunteers")

constraints.description: The number of full-time volunteers must meet or exceed the minimum required number.
constraints.code:
# Ensure the number of full-time volunteers meets or exceeds the minimum required number
model.addConstr(FullTimeVolunteers >= MinFullTimeVolunteers, name="min_full_time_volunteers")

objective.description: Maximize the total number of gifts delivered by the volunteers
objective.code:
# Define the objective function
model.setObjective(GiftsPerSeasonal * SeasonalVolunteers + GiftsPerFullTime * FullTimeVolunteers, gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)
